module.name: Do-Not-Disturb (DND)
module.changelog: *15.0.10* FREEI-3608 whoops error on rebuild *15.0.9* FREEI-3569 getWidgetListByModule method Dontdisturb module *15.0.8* Packaging of ver 15.0.8 *15.0.7* Packaging of ver 15.0.7 *15.0.6* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.4* fixing legacy restore *15.0.3* Rest Api *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Backup 15.0
module.description: Do not disturb (DND) allows calls to be rejected at the user's request via a feature code, UCP setting, or REST App.
